titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the unified credit against estate and gift taxes to the equivalent of a $5,000,000 exclusion and to provide an inflation adjustment of such amount.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/4/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the unified credit against the estate and gift taxes to $5 million and to provide for an annual cost-of-living adjustment to such amount.
